Trade/Device Name(s): Stratus® CS Acute CareTM D-dimer (DDMR) TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM D-dimer (DDMR) CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM D-dimer (DDMR) DilPak
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Stratus CS Acute Care D-dimer assay, calibrator, and diluent for quantitative measurement of D-dimer in plasma on Stratus CS analyzer
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of D-dimer in human citrated or heparinized plasma as an aid in diagnosing venous thromboembolism (VTE) including deep vein thrombosis (DVT) or pulmonary embolism (PE), for use by trained health care professionals in clinical laboratory and point of care settings
